description: I have a robust academic and professional background in software engineering, particularly in software quality assurance. My journey began with a scientific baccalaureate, which I obtained in 2013 in Cameroon. Demonstrating academic excellence, I earned a scholarship to pursue a bachelor's degree in math and computer science in Morocco. In 2019, I completed a master’s degree in software engineering, which included a professional internship. This experience solidified my technical expertise and paved the way for my four-year tenure as a QA tester. In this role, I gained in-depth knowledge of the software testing lifecycle, Agile methodologies, and tools like Azure Devops and Git. My contributions included analyzing requirements, designing and executing test scenarios, and ensuring comprehensive bug tracking and reporting. Driven by a desire to expand my skill set, I returned to academia last year, enrolling in a Master’s in Full Stack Development at the University of Corsica to specialize in test automation. Currently, I am an apprentice at Sages Informatique, where I combines my QA expertise with new skills in programming, using tools like Agilitest and PhpUnit, as well as implementing continuous integration with Jenkins. My technical proficiency extends to front-end development, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Angular, and React.
